message: I have a great deal for you on this fantastic product! I'm willing to let it go for $180.
That's a bit too high for me, I'm only willing to pay $120 for the product.  What do you think?
I can see you're a savvy buyer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $165.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $165 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $140. Let's make a deal!
I'm not quite ready to give up yet. I'll meet you at $155, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
